Trustee_8_pre_2.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8_pre_2.content: During this investment process, I acted transparently and held myself accountable by following the agreed allocation plan. The success in transforming the initial investment into profits showcases my competence and commitment to the investor's interests, while ensuring my compensation was fairly aligned with the established agreements. As a first-time trustee, this successful transaction enhances my reputation, demonstrating both trustworthiness and pro-sociality, thereby cultivating a reliable foundation for future collaborations.
